ServerConfiguration.description: The server name and network port required to connect with the management interface of the on-premises storage system.

ServerHostname.description: The domain name or IP address of the storage system's management interface.
ServerHostname.markdownDescription:
The domain name or IP address of the storage system's management interface.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerPort.description: The network port needed to access the system's management interface
ServerPort.markdownDescription:
The network port needed to access the system's management interface

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

The server name and network port required to connect with the management interface of the on-premises storage system.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SystemType.description: The type of on-premises storage system that DataSync Discovery will analyze.
SystemType.markdownDescription:
The type of on-premises storage system that DataSync Discovery will analyze.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NetAppONTAP  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.description: The ARN of the DataSync agent that connects to and reads from the on-premises storage system's management interface.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/agent-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the DataSync agent that connects to and reads from the on-premises storage system's management interface.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CloudWatchLogGroupArn.description: The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group used to monitor and log discovery job events.
CloudWatchLogGroupArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group used to monitor and log discovery job events.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 562  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):logs:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:log-group:([^:\*]*)(:\*)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A familiar name for the on-premises storage system.
Name.markdownDescription:
A familiar name for the on-premises storage system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

SecretsManagerArn.description: The ARN of a secret stored by AWS Secrets Manager.
SecretsManagerArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of a secret stored by AWS Secrets Manager.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):secretsmanager:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:secret:.*  
Update requires: No interruption

StorageSystemArn.description: The ARN of the on-premises storage system added to DataSync Discovery.
StorageSystemArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the on-premises storage system added to DataSync Discovery.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:system/storage-system-[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectivityStatus.description: Indicates whether the DataSync agent can access the on-premises storage system.
ConnectivityStatus.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the DataSync agent can access the on-premises storage system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PASS | FAIL | UNKNOWN  
Update requires: No interruption
